article.title: A Bookshelf in Public Health, Medical Care, and Allied Fields
article.author: La Rocco, AugustJones, Barbara
article.text: This bibliography of nonserial publications consists of 610 annotations.. It is intended as a guide to the development of a collection for librarians and for health professionals in research and education.. References are mostly to publications from 1960.. Titles are in English.. Both primary and secondary sources are cited..
